headline: All You Need to Know About Aflac (AFL) Rating Upgrade to Buy
summary: Aflac (AFL) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

raw.headline: All You Need to Know About Aflac (AFL) Rating Upgrade to Buy

headline: Ascensus Names Jeri Hawthorne Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Ascensus announced that career HR executive Jeri Hawthorne has joined the company as its Chief Human Resources Officer. She will report to Ascensus Chair and CEO David Musto and be based at the company's Dresher, PA, headquarters.

raw.headline: Ascensus Names Jeri Hawthorne Chief Human Resources Officer

headline: Aflac study reveals the impact of paid leave on employers and employees
summary: Key findings from the second annual Time Away Study1 released by Aflac, the leading provider of health supplemental insurance in the U.S.,2 reveal the significant physical, mental and professional challenges faced by employees who assume additional work when a co-worker is on leave. The study highlights the critical role that planning, communication and recognition play in maintaining employee well-being and productivity during these critical periods.
